items.text: Thank you for walking with me to get my laptop screen fixed and then joking about it later. You made a bad moment lighter ðŸ™‚

items.title: Thank you
items.text: Thank you for being there for me when I thought no one would. I mean it. Time and time again I pictured having to face a difficult time alone. I never imagined having the kind of support you've given me. No matter what happens in the future, I'll always be grateful for you.

items.title: Thank you
items.text: Thank you for being you. You'll always have been a positive influence on me. Life could have easily passed by without our paths crossing, and yet they did. So for whatever capacity I know you - I'm thankful for it.
